actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include rural health clinics within the definition of provider services with respect to such title.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to include a rural health clinic within the Medicare definition of "provider of services."

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to include rural health clinics within the definition of provider services with respect to such title.
